maps.gml

Class GMLShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.gml.GMLObject
      • maps.gml.GMLShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GMLBuilding, GMLRoad, GMLSpace

    public abstract class GMLShape
extends GMLObject
    Abstract base class for shapes in GML space.

        public void reorderEdges(java.util.List<GMLDirectedEdge> newEdges)
        Reorder the list of edges. This will not clear the neighbour map or the bounds.
        Parameters:
        newEdges - The reordered edge list.

      • replaceEdge

        public void replaceEdge(GMLDirectedEdge oldEdge,
               GMLDirectedEdge... newEdges)
        Replace a GMLDirectedEdge with a set of new edges. The neighbour of the old edge will be set for each of the new edges.
        Parameters:
        oldEdge - The edge to replace.
        newEdges - The new edges.
